meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Wander</kanji> from <kanji>stream</kanji> to stream and you'll get really used to <vocabulary>vagrancy</vocabulary>. You'll love <vocabulary>wandering</vocabulary> so much that you'll convert to <vocabulary>nomadism</vocabulary>. The open sky is your home!
readingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. Since you haven't learned this particular reading for 流, here's a mnemonic to help you:

When you think about it, <vocabulary>vagrancy</vocabulary> is kind of a <reading>loo</reading>phole (る). No one ever knows where you could be, making it hard to track you down.
